name: hydro-lottery
description: To compile all the files in a single solidity file, run `npm i` inside the `solidity-flattener/` folder. Then use the following command inside that `solidity-flattener` folder: ```     npm start '../HydroLottery.sol' ``` It will output the final file inside the `solidity-flattener/out/` folder.

scripts.ganache: ganache-cli -m 'capable idle all stumble typical organ jaguar man trap hospital ten talent'
